message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you
I'm aiming for a more balanced deal this time. This offer accounts for the time value of money with the inflation we're facing.
Considering inflation, I'll offer 58% for me, 42% for you. Let's settle this!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We both lose out the longer this goes. Meet me in the middle - this offer is my final concession.
